_sText:
Author: RouVix (rouvix@luukku.com)
Date: 9.1.2005.

I've just too tired of doing this map, because i have done it for atleast 2 years, because i started
doing it for CS 1.6. Its playable, but you might still find some bugs. Feels free to report them,
but i don't promise that i will fix them.

Due to CS:Source's new fantastic hostage navigation style, I couldn't get the hostages working right.
So you can give yourself a nice tap in the back if you get them out of the house. But who would get
the hostages in this small map anyway?

There are startpoint for 32 players, 17 for terrs and 15 for cts (last thing i added were the spawns
and i was very tired). The map is estate-style, but not estate on source. There are many routes and 
lots of stuff to kick around (and physics work hl2-style, not CS:S-style). I desinged this as a aim_
map in the first place so feel free to use it as a aim_, ka_ or anything else if you want. 

----installation:
You dont need the .txt file for anything anymore, as you just read it, but put the s_cs_nighthut.bsp 
and s_cs_nighthut.nav in you steam/steamapps/(your e-mail)/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps folder.



Have Fun.
